attributes.action: Make David Beckham captain of Team GB and re-instate him to the 2012 Olympic squad
attributes.additional_details: Everyone who is anyone who know's anything about football, know's that a great injustice has today been served. Team GB football is a showcase, a one off spectacular, never to be seen again - it is an outrage that David Beckham after his commitment to this country has been ejected from the 2012 squad by "that Psycho guy who missed the penalty" - please, people of Great Britain, show them this is wrong, bring back Goldenballs!
